info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 10:30PM EDT until March 31 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EDT/945 PM CDT/ FOR WESTERN ST. JOSEPH...STARKE...NORTHWESTERN MARSHALL...LA PORTE AND SOUTHEASTERN BERRIEN COUNTIES... At 1030 PM EDT/930 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Shorewood-Tower Hill to near Kingsford Heights to near La Crosse, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... South Bend, La Porte, Buchanan, Knox, Bridgman, Walkerton, North Liberty, New Carlisle, Berrien Springs, Three Oaks, Kingsford Heights, Stevensville, Hamlet, La Crosse, Shorewood-Tower Hill, Shorewood-Tower Hills-Harbert, Koontz Lake, Dayton, Oak Grove and Hanna. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 50 and 73. Interstate 94 in Michigan between mile markers 3 and 23. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT/200 AM CDT/ for north central and northwestern Indiana...and southwestern Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
